definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased

sentences.english: We need to know why honeybees are dying.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要弄清楚蜜蜂正在消亡的原因。

sentences.english: Calligraphy has practically become a lost art in today‘s computer society.
sentences.chinese: 在今天的電腦時代，書法藝術差不多要消亡了。

sentences.english: Another once-common reason for starting to smoke is also disappearing.
sentences.chinese: 開始吸菸的另一條曾經流行的理由也正在消亡。

sentences.english: In North America it's something like two-thirds to three-quarters.'
sentences.chinese: 在北美，因此消亡的物種高達三分之二至四分之三。

sentences.english: Don’t get me wrong, I’m sad about the demise of print, too.
sentences.chinese: 別誤會我的意思，對於印刷品的消亡我也很難過。

sentences.english: When the body breaks,I cease to exist as a person.
sentences.chinese: 當肉體消亡時，我就不作爲人存在了。

sentences.english: As such, political and social activism was an end in itself.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的話，政治和社會激進主義都將自動消亡。

sentences.english: The vanishment of Forfeiture of Property is an inexorable historical tr…
sentences.chinese: 沒收財產刑走向消亡是歷史的必然趨勢。

sentences.english: The state grocery monopoly ended in less than one year.
sentences.chinese: 國有供銷社不到一年就完全消亡。

sentences.english: From the end of Qing dynasty to Minguo, Miyun Manchu City was gradually ruined.
sentences.chinese: 從清末至民國時期，密雲“滿城”逐漸走向了消亡。

sentences.english: Gone are the days of Mao when peasant uprisings could collectively capture the nation.
sentences.chinese: 在農民起義共同奪取國家政權之後，毛時代就在消亡。

sentences.english: The old values are withering away in a new society.
sentences.chinese: 舊的價值觀念在新社會里正在逐漸消亡。

sentences.english: He that trusts in alie shall perish in truth.
sentences.chinese: 置信謊言的人必將在過失前消亡。

sentences.english: Stuck in a relationship that was over years ago?
sentences.chinese: 是否困頓在一年前就已消亡的感情關係中？

sentences.english: Your body's going to die,but your personality could continue.
sentences.chinese: 你的身體會消亡，但人格會繼續存活。

definition: to decline/to die out/decline and fall
to be destroyed/to become extinct/to perish/to die out/to destroy/to exterminate
to fall/to drop/to decline/to deteriorate/to go downhill
lit. scattered ashes and dispersed smoke (idiom)/fig. to be annihilated/to vanish in a puff of smoke
to extinguish/to become extinct/to die out
to fall down/to decay/to fall from the sky/to die
to bury/to submerge/to pass into oblivion/to obliterate/to annihilate (physics)
